Text:
- Removed TriggerKMS.
- Add /task flag to KMSELDI.
- Auto Task "KMS Activation" for activation every reboot without backup and sound.
- Add $OEM$ folder only to be included inside of Windows *.iso install.

NOTE:
If you installed v2, unistall it and delete the folder %programfiles%KMSpico by hand.
Hi, I've Windows 8 activated (retail) and I only want to activate Office 365 Home Premium; this Kms gives the possibility to activate only Office 365? Sorry if this is a stupid question :)

it will skip the retail activation and activates ur office
try it and give ur feedback mate

I've followed the instructions (Run KMSpico_Install_v2.exe) then I heard an audio message "(...) program complete". Then I went to check my Office 365 account and the expiration date is still there: 14th March 2013 :( probably did something wrong - can you help?
No, I did not run the KMSpico_Install_v2.1.exe as "Admininistrator" when installing... :(
I did run again the KMSpico_Install_v2.1.exe as "Admininistrator" when installing... but still the same :(
I guess this kms don't word for Office 365 :(
